author: Staff Reporter
text: The Mettupalayam Police have arrested Abu Bakkar Siddiq, Dwarak and Sarath Kumar on charges of thieving. The police said that the three snatched ex-serviceman A. Ajith’s bag containing Rs. 60,000 and attempted to run away from a liquor shop but were caught and handed over to them. Based on a complaint from Mr. Ajith they had registered a case.
title: Three held on robbery charge
